name: Extremophile
description:
Extremophile! You're a daring ninja in a world made of two extreme environments, one fiery hot and the other freezing cold. Both have enemies out to get you...  or to heal you? Make sure that you never overheat or freeze to death and survive for as long as you can!

Controls:

WASD to move

Click to shoot

Health Bar: Red is hot, blue is cold; Don't let either fill up the entire bar!

UPDATED, THE GAME NOW WORKS. THANKS TO THE HOST FOR FORGIVING OUR LATE FIX! :)
